           HAPPY FATHER'S DAY -DAD!

lenders.name: Kerrie
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Sean

lenders.occupational_info: Yumiko is busy taking care of two little ones at home and never gets enough sleep.  Steve is working for a Japanese Company in Shanghai.

lenders.name: Andy and Lacie
lenders.loan_because: We're all in this together.

lenders.name: Lynne
lenders.loan_because: I want to support people to give life a go, and change their way of life. To support their families and feel proud of their achivements
lenders.occupational_info: I support people in their work and home life. Make sure they are safe in their workplace.

lenders.name: Stacy
lenders.loan_because: I'm so grateful to have the resources and this opportunity to lend a helping hand around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am raising two kids, running a household, and actively volunteering in my community.

lenders.name: Alec
lenders.loan_because: I'm always beaking off about how I'd like to help and how I wished there was a way for me to help without  some crumby tinpot dictator taking / wrecking the effort.  KIVA answers this issue by providing a direct hand up instead of a hand out thereby creating positive change through empowerment.
lenders.occupational_info: I find innovative ways to finance / find sources of financing for my company

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: it helps empower the borrowers to create a better world ....but expect them to have the pride and courtesy to repay their loans punctually !!!

lenders.name: Lissa
lenders.loan_because: I want to do something to help others. I am especially interested in helping women whose daily work is often not counted or devalued, but who contribute an enormous amount to their families and communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a communications professional helping businesses communicate their message through communications strategy/ planning and content development. My background is in publishing and communications with a focus on working with businesses who are trying to make the world a better place.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.occupational_info: I sell international tours to teachers and their students.

lenders.name: Melanie
lenders.loan_because: When you give from your heart, it's the greatest gift you can give. All donations are in memory of our beautiful son, Carson Warner Kennedy, who died in 2005. He inspired us to give.
lenders.occupational_info: I publish magazines & also own a media company that produces commercials, music videos, TV & Film projects. Many other people helped me get started so I want to support other entrepreneurs around the world!

lenders.name: Samit
lenders.occupational_info: Owner and operator of a few hotels.

lenders.name: Manny & Stacey
lenders.loan_because: We enjoy helping people to better themselves.  Everyone needs help from time to time.

lenders.name: Bennie
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Yayoi

I was moved very much when I knew this idea.
May the people all over the world be happy !

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: its a good thing to do
lenders.occupational_info: I sell land

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because:
I feel that I'm more fortunate than a lot of people in the world.  The least that I can do is loan them money to get started.
The 'trickle-down' theory that the world bank and many first world countries believe is not helping those who really need it and are only supplying the elite in those impoverished countries.  This is my way of making a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school everyday and row in the afternoons.  :-)

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: Though I don't have much, I am blessed with more than I need to survive, and I want to see people do something more purposeful with $25 than I ever could spending it on myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm living in an urban poor community in Manila to better understand the mindsets and systems affecting the situations here.

lenders.name: Wayde
lenders.loan_because: it helps.

lenders.name: Eli Belda
lenders.loan_because: Me with my disabled I.T. friend wanted to register our service offered business to prospective clients that requires us to provide permits and licenses to perform the contracted project works. Our offered service or proposals simply rejected due to lacking services license and permits. We also wanted to have a second hand computer desktop for us to perform the project task, to rent a small space with one telephone line. After we set-up the business, my next plan is to help jobless and skilled professionals to work with us , earned some training and simply receive also income for a living.
lenders.occupational_info: I am working as freelance service provider specializes in bookkeeping and computer programming system development for business processes such as payroll system, billing system, inventory system, etc. My skills requires more in providing business process solutions to my clients needs.

lenders.name: Mandy
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people who normally wouldn't have access to a loan

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: the world is small  and every thing anyone can do to bring it closer and the differences smaller needs to be done. One person CAN make a difference.

lenders.name: Corentin
lenders.loan_because:
I care,
I love entrepreneurship,
I want to help
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm handling the online promotion for major Hip-hop artists.
I am the General Manager of an online community counting 400+K members

lenders.name: Grahame
lenders.loan_because: I was introduced to Kiva while I was doing a course on the net.  I liked what I saw and decided to lend a very modest sum.  The idea appeals to me in that money is lent to people who are trying to improve their lives and I am glad that I am able to assist in a small way.  The idea of lending money rather than giving appealed to me.  I will continue to re-lend the money as it becomes available.  A fabulous idea all round!

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for what I have in life and appreciate it every day. If I can make a small positive difference to someone else's life - fantastic!
lenders.occupational_info: In Vietnam in 2008 I was embarrassed by my career, trying to explain to someone who works in the fields all day and has very little to eat. I am a Personal Trainer.......

lenders.loan_because: I believe helping people help themselves, empowers them and enhances their dignity.

lenders.name: Kay
lenders.loan_because: I am inspired by the difference it can make.
lenders.occupational_info: I am training to become a psychotherapist. I believe that the less personal fear in the world means a more peaceful world.

lenders.name: Wout
lenders.loan_because: I think microfinance is the way to go.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a webdesigner.

lenders.loan_because: i like to help people who are prepared to work hard
lenders.occupational_info: had small bussinessis then sold and now sell   houses

lenders.name: Glenys & Bruce
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to keep on keeping on!

lenders.name: Mary

lenders.occupational_info: I am a poet.  I write about my family, my spiritual beliefs and about war.

lenders.name: Kuniko

lenders.loan_because: I can!

lenders.name: Pam & Wayne
lenders.loan_because: We like reading the stories. We enjoy helping someone make a better life for themselves and their families. Paying-it-Forward is truly a wonderful thing!

lenders.name: miriam and derek
lenders.loan_because:
We have everything we need. There are many things we want but we really do not need them and we want others to have a chance at a better life. We decided this year to make donations instead of getting gifts for birthdays and christmas etc. 
It gives you a really good feeling to help someone and we are looking forward to building up a good sized portfolio.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work in a large hardware store selling water pumps, generators, electric and gas motors mainly to farmers, contractors etc.
My husband reconditions car batteries and also has an entertainment business which provides music at weddings, proms birthday parties etc.

lenders.name: barbara
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office as a secretary. Most of my day is spent typing documents and correspondence, making appointments, arranging meetings and taking minutes at meetings.  One of my hobbies is making bead jewellery including necklaces, bracelets and earrings and I am starting to sell them as a small business venture.

lenders.name: Jose
lenders.loan_because: unfortunatelly most people in the world need money much more than I do

I think that I only have to become help of people who have the motivation. Please 
hold out taking care of health very.

lenders.name: Patricia

lenders.occupational_info: Stressing, tiring but nice

自分の力で働いてお金を稼ぐ事は

lenders.loan_because: I live with many blessings and I know they are meant to be shared. We are one world and unity through simple things like this create balance and harmony in our chaotic world.

lenders.name: Lyndell
lenders.loan_because: I think I live a very fortunate life and that we all have an obligation to do whatever we can to lend a hand to others who are less fortunate.  If i can make a difference to someone else's life with an amount I can afford then maybe I have gone a little way to doing that.

lenders.name: Natalie
lenders.loan_because: I know if that was me, someone would lend me money.
lenders.occupational_info: Going to School.

lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: I believe that these people will work hard to succeed.

lenders.loan_because: I'm trying to teach children the value of money.

lenders.name: miri

lenders.loan_because: I don't need anything and want to help those that do.

lenders.name: kyle
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I am a high school senior. I love to surf and travel.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for the opportunities I've had in my life and wish the same for others.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: There's nothing more important than helping someone in need.

lenders.name: Remi & Wendy
lenders.loan_because: I believe that  everyone has the ability to do great things in life. The motive or motivation to do things is internal, but, we all need a little help sometimes. Kiva is a great vehicle to lend a little help to those with the motive inside them.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people and give them a chance they should be given to help themselves and others in their community.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm just a high school student trying to figure out what to do with my life!

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the Oregon Breast and cervical Cancer Program helping uninsured and under insured women get breast and cervical cancer screening.

lenders.name: Lindsay
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the idea of a global community and the necessity of helping one another.

lenders.name: Sean and Alison
lenders.loan_because: We're middle class Canadians, the luckiest people in the world. Everyone deserve the same kind of life.

lenders.name: Mikeeli
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference!
lenders.occupational_info: Instead of  friends giving me a birthday gift, they brought a small donation that I would collect for Kiva...they were so generous. Thank you friends!! I hope to see how many people we can help by reinvesting when the loan is repaid!

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I hope to make a positive difference in another person's life.

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: I know that this is a way in which I can help people across the globe.  It troubles me that there is so much conflict in our world and I think that helping everyone to acheive stability is an essential first step in bringing our world together.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on helping create new innovation for household appliances (dishwashers, washing machines, etc.) with my primary focus being on innovation for health benefits.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: Beats haggling with the investment community and greedy business sharks focused on the capital raising markets in Australia
lenders.occupational_info: Business management consulting and capital raising

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: I am very fortunate and I want to share my good fortune with other people who need a helping hand.  I believe in a hand up--not a hand out.
lenders.occupational_info: I handle the accounting side of a large interstate trucking company.

lenders.name: LEIGH
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have a dream!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a wife, and mother of three teens/young adults. I am also a full time student seeking a degree in Humanities.

lenders.name: Meg and Sequoia Students
lenders.loan_because: We want to help women start businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of high school students in California who want to help support other women in the world.

lenders.name: Carrie
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Coordinate care for patients at Western Colorado Physicians Group.

lenders.name: Alexander
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lenders.name: Vandboeffelklubben
lenders.loan_because: “Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful committed citizens can change the world. Indeed, it´s the only thing that ever has.” Margaret Mead, American Cultural Anthropologist
lenders.occupational_info:
LOWB/Vandboeffelklubben means Loyal Order of Water Buffaloes. One of our missions is to provide poor families a water buffalo in countries where it is espesially needed. A water buffalo can lead a hungry family out of poverty and give them a chance for a bright future filled with hope and free from hunger. The animal provides draft power for planting rice and potatoes, milk for protein and manure for fertilizer and fuel.
Claus Moller,World President

lenders.name: Rubén Sotelo
lenders.loan_because: I think that is one of the best ways to offer opportunities to poor families so that they can develop their potential with the aid of microcredits´s institutions.
lenders.occupational_info: Civil engineer and university teacher.

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: According to Paul Collier's book "The Bottom Billion", private investment is much needed in slow economies.  Poor countries are generally too risky for a major investment.  Micro-lending is a great way to provide private funding without assuming a great risk.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people keep their money safe.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: I want to help teachers around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I taught school for 37 years.  I know what it means to be a teacher and am happy to be able to help teachers and their families.

lenders.name: Sherri
lenders.loan_because: we are all in this together.
lenders.occupational_info: i like to see the use in things others would consider useless

lenders.name: Reger Family
lenders.loan_because: People matter.
lenders.occupational_info: He fixes what is broken. She finds out how it is made.

lenders.name: Sherry
lenders.loan_because: A small drop in the bucket has a ripple effect. I imagine people all over the world in business for themselves and know this will truly change their lives and the world economy.
lenders.occupational_info: I am  jewelry designer and I have my own little shops on the web.

lenders.name: Simon Suh
lenders.loan_because: Kiva means unity.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a big fan of great ideas.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I am happy to help someone who is trying to help themself.  Plus, I try to live by the Gandhi quote "We Must Become The Change We Wish To See In The World."
lenders.occupational_info: I am an actress in film & television.  I get much joy out of allowing other people to remove themselves from their own lives for a brief period of time and possibly feeling certain emotions they might not normally feel, as I bring to life the characters that I play on screen.

lenders.name: Mrs. Shafer's Class
lenders.loan_because: My 5th grade students are learning the value of giving to people who hope to make life better for themselves, their families, and their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a public school teacher. I teach 5th grade. My students are between the ages of 10-11.  Our class raised money by making cards and selling them at school in order to donate money to entreprenuers around the world.

lenders.name: Family B.O.B.C.I.D.
lenders.occupational_info: We are an extended Canadian family of 18 who care about other families in the world.

lenders.name: larry
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help shrink the gap between the top and bottom of the wealth spectrum.

lenders.name: The Pyke Family
lenders.loan_because: We hope that we can make a difference to people's lives by helping them reach their goals
lenders.occupational_info: We work in the disability field and together with our children we are all happy and healthy - we are a very lucky family

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: good people need help and if I am able, then it's my job as a Christian to do so!

lenders.name: Radiance
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: Deanne
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people

lenders.name: Philip
lenders.loan_because: supporting self-reliance is the greatest contribution we can make to the welfare of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies create brands like "Coca-Cola," "Nike," and "Apple."

lenders.name: Cameron
lenders.loan_because: because I think it's fun to help other people. I really want to help people in Africa and India because they need me most.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a very good drawer, I'm nice (and you can tell that because I'm helping people), I am fast (running), and I'm a very good fisherman.

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: I want to help good people who need to catch a break.
lenders.occupational_info: I am attending University to become a high school history teacher and baseball coach.

lenders.name: steven
lenders.loan_because: because i can  i should and i will  and darnit , makes me feel all warm and fuzy inside.

lenders.name: Michele
lenders.loan_because: It's more fun that buying crap on eBay.
lenders.occupational_info: In America we have a very complicated system to pay for health care that costs everyone way too much money.  Unfortunately I am part of the expense of that system.  I help non-profit doctors get as much as possible from the insurance companies and the government to pay for low-income people's health care.

lenders.name: Evelyn
lenders.loan_because: I have been so very blessed and I have a passion to help women who face challenges from their circumstances.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a partner in a business that provides professional business services to large corporations.

lenders.name: Osamu
lenders.loan_because: I beleived in the Living Money must wait for the people need it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am living in tokyo, and sometimes have actions as a volanteer member of the NGOs , for PR about poor, hunger, refgee and war.

lenders.name: Joan
lenders.loan_because: Knowing who the recipient is and how it will help them, feels good and then being able to do it all over again for someone else - great!!

lenders.name: Pete
lenders.loan_because: People need it and it is great to see where the contributions go.

lenders.name: Ric
lenders.loan_because: I want to be able to make a positive difference to someone else's life.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: I plan to be around for the next 80+ years, and I want the world to be even better on my way out.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: The people and their stories fascinate and move me. They bring me hope and encouragement, they light up the world and make it a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a journalist and I write stories about people and events, I lay out and design newsletters and fliers and other materials for publishing. I create art -- mixed media art -- in my "spare" time.

lenders.name: Yoshi
lenders.loan_because: We could not solve poverty by the legacy politics. So, we have to find and do it new way. Walk on together!

I develop open source for my business client. And share it to the world.
I'm a webmaster of amnesty international japan too.

lenders.name: Jon & Deanne
lenders.loan_because: I know the hard work it takes when you are self employed.  The dedication to their trade and their efforts to improve their lives is truly inspiring.  It's a fantastic program and we are so thankful that we can help.
lenders.occupational_info: I negotiate the leases and sales of office buildings in the Sacramento, CA region and my wife is the CEO of our home and children.

lenders.name: Courtney
lenders.loan_because: helping others is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Roland
lenders.loan_because: We can help those who try to help themselves and it might make a small difference to the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked as an administrator in the Queensland Government but have been retired for some years.

lenders.name: K n K
lenders.loan_because: We can and we want to

lenders.name: Jack

lenders.name: claire

lenders.name: Christine

lenders.occupational_info: I teach adult students at a community college.

lenders.name: Eileen
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people to help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired

lenders.name: John Engen
lenders.loan_because: I have been richly blessed and assisted by many others over the years.  I am honored to have the opportunity to reach out to others that might benefit in some small way.  In turn, perhaps each of those that benefit, will assist others, multiplying the positive impact all across the globe.
lenders.occupational_info: offering a leg-up, not a hand-out.

lenders.name: Albert
lenders.loan_because: I hope the money will do some people good.
lenders.occupational_info: I help design, assemble, and maintain small to large computer networks for larger companies.

lenders.name: Blane
lenders.loan_because:
I've had the chance to see firsthand what a difference access to credit can make, and how difficult peoples' lives can be without it.

Does Kiva help to resolve the huge structural imbalances at the root of the inequality between North and South?  No.   

Does it help people in the South to live better lives in spite of these inequalities?  I hope so.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop training programs on the impacts of climate change.

lenders.name: Morgan
lenders.loan_because: I know how difficult it is to lift oneself out of poverty, and how difficult it can be to obtain a loan to do so.  I'm very honored to be able to play a small part in the success of these hard working people.
lenders.occupational_info: I help women and their children stay physically healthy.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I care about people.
lenders.occupational_info: International Behavior, Culture and Relationship Consultant, writer and talk show guest.

lenders.name: Ben

Fine Jewelry Sales - aid clients in making the best decisions in their jewelry purchases
Marketing Consultant - advise new companies in best practice methods to bring their products to market.

Somaly channelled her pain into helping women in Cambodia and around the world. She inspired me to start making loans to women in developing countries to assist with improving their economic circumstances.
lenders.occupational_info: Executive Search, Talent Sourcing, Recruitment, Career Management.

lenders.name: Jim

lenders.name: Olivier & Vanessa

lenders.loan_because: It's that fundamental belief — I am my brother's keeper, I am my sister's keeper — that makes this country work. It's what allows us to pursue our individual dreams, yet still come together as a single American family. "E pluribus unum." Out of many, one. Barack Obama.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a student, taking a year out from my studies before I start a degree course. Otherwise, at the moment I work in a basic grocery shop behind the counter.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.occupational_info: In America, there are racetracks where people bet money on greyhound dogs.  When the dogs are not good enough to make money at the racetrack, many of them are killed.  But these dogs make wonderful pets.  So we take the dogs from the racetracks and try to find families who will love them.  We have 6 of them as family pets.

lenders.name: Naama
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for my parents for giving me the opportunities i have and i wish to help others do the same for their families. Also its nice to see the people who gets the money, and the difference it make to their life.

lenders.name: Bobby & Marie

"The Church considers it her task always to call attention to the dignity and rights of those who work, to condemn situations in which that dignity and those rights are violated, and to help to guide changes so as to ensure authentic progress by man and society."

~Pope John Paul II, Laborem Exercens

lenders.occupational_info: I'm a scavenger, I buy anything I think I can sell and find a good home for.

lenders.name: Michael

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I watched Oprah and saw Kiva and was inspired for the first time in a really long time. Kiva makes sense to me in terms of giving. I get so much from giving. I am so lucky to know about Kiva! Thank you all.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a freelance project manager and at the moment I am working with the health agency here in London to improve health services for children and young people. I also work for a charity that campaigns for children's rights who are living in the care of the state.
